txt.en: The Orc camp Hanksar-mokh sits south-west of Gundabad.\n\nDefeating Orcs there would send a strong message.
The Orc camp Hanksar-mokh sits south-west of Gundabad.\n\nDefeating Orcs there would send a strong message.
You have defeated a number of Orcs at Hanksar-mokh.
Your actions will allow the dwarf-forces to take a breather in this long fight.
The Orc presence at Hanksar-mokh cannot be ignored
Hanksar-mokh's proximity to Gundabad allows the Orcs to grow bold in their attacks on the dwarves.

Hanksar-mokh's proximity to Gundabad allows the Orcs to grow bold in their attacks on the dwarves. Thinning their presence there would send a message that not even Hanksar-mokh is safe, and it would allow the dwarves to focus their ranks on more strategic areas.
